name: Awaken the Spirit
text: When you gain this card, place it face up in your play area: The Cantokylegance player cannot use their Seamless Integration faction ability against planets you control.  If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Cantokylegance player's units, return this card to the Cantokylegance player

name: Hidden Pathways
text: After you activate a system:Choose 1 of your units, that unit can move through other players’ ships during this movement. Then, return this card to the Eidolon player

name: Grave Robber
text: After an agenda is revealed:You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, place 1 unit that costs no more than 4 resources from your reinforcements into your home system, if it contains no other players’ ships.Then, return this card to the Skalidur player.

name: Mechanical Vigor
text: At the start of a round of ground combat that involves one or more of your mechs, against a player other than the Mechikide: Apply +2 to the result of each of your mechs combat rolls for this round.  Then, return this card to the Mechikide player.

name: Angelic Favor
text: After you activate a system: Your units ignore the effects of anomalies. Then, return this card to the Saeraphyme player.
